login.title: Welcome to Flavortime
login.subtitle: Connect Flavortime and share your Flavortown coding status!
login.pyramid_promo_html: Are you on Pyramid Scheme? Sign up to share your Flavortown referral code.
login.error_failed: Login was denied or expired. Please try again.
login.error_generic: Login failed before we got the callback.
login.error_canceled: Login canceled. You can try again anytime.
login.error_timeout: Login timed out. If your browser is still loading localhost, close it and try again.

login_modal.title: Logging into Flavortime
login_modal.subtitle: Enter your Flavortown API key to continue. You can get this in Flavortown settings.

referral.title: Pyramid Scheme
referral.button_visibility_info: There is a button shown for signing up as well, but it won't be visible to you and only to other users. This is a Discord limitation!
referral.custom_code_hint: Leave blank to use your synced Pyramid Scheme codes.
referral.no_pyramid_promo: No Pyramid Scheme code found yet. Join Pyramid Scheme to generate one.

rpc.active_detail: Discord session is live and Flavortime can update your presence.
rpc.waiting_detail: Discord is still starting up. Keep Discord open or press refresh.
rpc.disabled_detail: Enable Flavortime in App settings to reconnect to Discord.

updater.downloading: There is an update available. Downloading...
updater.installing_windows: Update downloaded. The Windows installer should launch automatically.

rich_presence.status_tagline: Work on your personal projects, get rewarded with prizes. For teens ages <19

actions.refresh_tooltip: Re-fetch referral codes and Hackatime data
actions.confirm_logout: You are about to log out of Flavortime.
actions.confirm_reset: This will reset Flavortime settings and log you out.

adult.title: No Flavortown
adult.referral_hint: Leave blank to hide it from Discord.
